title: Topic 015 Question 004
body: You need to ensure that VM1 can communicate with VM4. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
options: Create a user-defined route from VNET1 to VNET3.
Create an NSG and associate the NSG to VM1 and VM4.
Assign VM4 an IP address of 10.0.1.5/24.
Establish peering between VNET1 and VNET3.
